text: Old Great Bulgaria was a 7th-century nomadic empire. It was created by the Onogur Bulgars on the western Ponticâ€“Caspian steppe (what is now southern Ukraine and southwest Russia). ==History== In the early 7th century, Khan Kubrat united the Onogur Bulgars and other Turkic tribes. == References == Category:Former countries in Europe
title: Old Great Bulgaria
